amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Homeland Security, in consultation with the Transportation Secretary, to study whether there is a continued need for a supplemental air and maritime navigation system as a backup to GPS.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-311 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security, in consultation with the Transportation Secretary, to study whether there is a continued need for a supplemental air and maritime navigation system as a backup to GPS.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
